TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi Underline extends System.Windows.Documents.Span

Docs.param: A indicating the beginning of a selection of content to be contained by the new .
A indicating the end of a selection of content to be contained by the new .
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, taking two objects that indicate the beginning and end of a selection of content to be contained by the new .

remarks.format:
## Remarks This constructor is intended to initialize a new <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Underline> element such that it encloses a selection of pre-existing content.
## Examples The following example demonstrates usage of this constructor.
[!code-csharp[SpanSnippets#_Underline_Const3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/SpanSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_underline_const3)] [!code-vb[SpanSnippets#_Underline_Const3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/SpanSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_underline_const3)]

Docs.exception: Raised when and do not resolve to a range of content suitable for enclosure by a element, for example, if and indicate positions in different paragraphs.
